column1: Visitation will be held on Sunday
column3: 2015 at Ford-Wulf-Bruns Chapel from 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. with family greeting friends from 3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. Funeral Services will be held on Monday
column5: 2015 at 10:00 a.m. at Ford-Wulf-Bruns Chapel in Coffeyville
column6: KS. Pastor Mark Wettengel will officiate. Burial will follow at the North Edna Elm Grove Cemetery in Edna
